author: EXM7777
text:
the fastest way to hit $10k/mo with an agency is picking one high-demand skill and using AI to scale it beyond what anyone else can do...

here's an example of how you could do it:

study what's going viral on faceless tiktok and reels... break down the scripts, the editing patterns, the trends that keep popping up

learn how to recreate those videos yourself and build out a solid portfolio so you have proof you can deliver results

then automate every single part of the process with AI so you can pump out 10x more content than anyone doing it manually

once you've got that system locked in you build an AI-powered lead gen machine that feeds you clients on autopilot

this gets you to $10k/mo faster than any other approach i've seen
